content.rendered: A neat little discovery today…meebo. A VERY simple web-based, multi-protocol chat client. What does that mean? Well, that you can use MSN, Yahoo Chat and Google Chat all from a single web page without even downloading anything! Probably only really useful from workplaces or if you’re in an internet cafe.
